channel.title: Why can i only play on my server using 0.0.0.0?
channel.description: Yes, why can i only play on my server using 0.0.0.0 and 127.0.0.1? im puzzled, my no-ip is xtremepkz but [b]STILL[/b] i can't connect to it through that? Help me Please ive tryed and i think it may because of not having a client but that dosn't sound right, the only notible things to add are that im using silab i can connect to my server using 0.0.0.0 on both Silab and the Moparscape Webclient.

your help has propelled me to the final stage before coding it to suit my needs =][/quote]

is that all you needed??

try connecting to your server with the no-ip that you made and 0.0.0.0.

reply back if it works or not

item.source: Why can i only play on my server using 0.0.0.0?

item.title: Why can i only play on my server using 0.0.0.0?
item.dc:creator: @Razor69 Razor69
item.description:
@Razor69 wrote:

[quote=“yeesnaw, post:4, topic:260158”]Owz, i did port forward it right

Razor69 you’ve been a great help, but i went on my brothers computer and got an error connecting to the server![/quote]
yeah, it’s because your brother is connected to the same internet connection.
you have to get your 192.168.x.x internal ip to connect from your bro’s computer.

Read full topic

item.source: Why can i only play on my server using 0.0.0.0?

item.title: Why can i only play on my server using 0.0.0.0?
item.dc:creator: @Razor69 Razor69
item.description:
@Razor69 wrote:

you cant connect to the no-ip from the computer your hosting on because that would be like externally connecting to your computer, from your computer
the no-ip, or your external ip are for other people to connect to your server using, as long as other people can connect using the no-ip you’re all good.

Read full topic
